scripts.test: echo "Error: no test specified" && echo "Another line?" && echo "Okay then"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:library && npm run build:unit && npm run yaml:compile
scripts.build:library-old: npm run build:library.start && concat-cli -f build/library-start.yml -o build/library-start-m.yml && npm run yaml:library.start
scripts.build:library: npm run build:library.start && luamin -f build/library-start.yml > build/library-start-m.yml && npm run yaml:library.start
scripts.build:unit: npm run build:unit.start && concat-cli -f build/unit-start.yml -o build/unit-start-m.yml && npm run yaml:unit.start && npm run build:unit.stop && luamin -f build/unit-stop.yml > build/unit-stop-m.yml && npm run yaml:unit.stop
scripts.build:library.start: concat-cli -f src/general-locals.lua -f src/library-common.lua -f src/library-controller.lua -f src/library-executor.lua -f src/library-keyactions.lua -f src/library-template.lua -f src/library-commands.lua -f src/library-throttle.lua -f src/library-flight.lua -f src/library-brakes.lua -f src/library-hovers.lua -f src/library-groundmode.lua -f src/library-agg.lua -f src/library-fuel.lua -f src/library-gear.lua -f src/library-stabilize.lua -f src/library-hud.lua -f src/library-atlas.lua -f src/library-autopilot.lua -f src/library-warp.lua -f src/library-warnings.lua -f src/library-genericbuttons.lua -o build/library-start.yml
scripts.yaml:library.start: type build\library-start-m.yml | indent-string --count=2 > build/library.start.yml && concat-cli -f src/general-yaml.yml -f build/library.start.yml -o build/library.start.yml
scripts.yaml:unit.start: type build\unit-start-m.yml | indent-string --count=2 > build/unit.start.yml && concat-cli -f src/general-yaml.yml -f build/unit.start.yml -o build/unit.start.yml
scripts.yaml:unit.stop: type build\unit-stop-m.yml | indent-string --count=2 > build/unit.stop.yml && concat-cli -f src/general-yaml.yml -f build/unit.stop.yml -o build/unit.stop.yml
